dcterms:description: The Continuous Mountain Car environment is a standard benchmark for the continuous state, discrete action RL setting. An underpowered car whose actions are in {a1, 0, 1} must reach its goal at the top of a hill by gaining momentum from another hill.
dcterms:title: Continuous Mountain Car (CMC)

dcterms:creator: Greg Brockman
Vicki Cheung
Ludwig Pettersson
Jonas Schneider
John Schulman
Jie Tang
Wojciech Zaremba
dcterms:description: The Half-Cheetah environment is a larger benchmark where the agent moves a 2D bipedal body made of 8 articulated rigid links. The agent can observe the positions and angles of its joints, its linear positions and velocities, and can act on the torques of its leg joints.
dcterms:title: Half-Cheetah (HC)
